abstract: CIT Group, a large finance company trying to avoid bankruptcy, reached a tentative agreement with Goldman Sachs Group over a disputed payment on a $3 billion loan, Dow Jones Newswires reported.
snippet: CIT Group, a large finance company trying to avoid bankruptcy, reached a tentative agreement with Goldman Sachs Group over a disputed payment on a $3 billion loan, Dow Jones Newswires reported.
lead_paragraph: CIT Group, a large finance company trying to avoid bankruptcy, reached a tentative agreement with Goldman Sachs Group over a disputed payment on a $3 billion loan, Dow Jones Newswires reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: CIT and Goldman Said to Reach Deal on Debt
